TopicTitle: Mechanical Mouse Industries - Kethane & Payload Packs Released!!!

Articles.Content:
Dani-Sang any hints to when the next update will be released, or that still TBA.

love the pack, cant wait for additions

Still not known - we got a lot of work recently, so don't expect update soon.

Still not known - we got a lot of work recently, so don't expect update soon.

Ay, we want to deliver a finished plugin and that takes time. Not only are we making a finished product, but also documentation to use Kethane for your own plugin's etc etc.

Currently I'm busy as freelancer and even have to work this weekend. After that I got "free" time again and kulesz an I will work hard to finish it.

thats understandable, developing and marketing takes time

and not everybody has that much time to waste

thats understandable, developing and marketing takes time

and not everybody has that much time to waste

Not a waste of time if its fun and makes them happy. But still I understand what your saying. Moddin is a big time cOmitment for a small payoff. It's good work the modded a do but people tend to take it for granted. I hope you guys have a good time developing this mod, it is great!

Not a waste of time if its fun and makes them happy. But still I understand what your saying. Moddin is a big time cOmitment for a small payoff. It's good work the modded a do but people tend to take it for granted. I hope you guys have a good time developing this mod, it is great!

ThQ, I appreciate your words!

will you be adding kethane tanks in every size?

So this is def my fav lil mun mission going on

[ATTACH=CONFIG]32631[/ATTACH]

Here's the Kethane Crew Station

[ATTACH=CONFIG]32632[/ATTACH]

And here are the Multipurpose Trucks (ISA, Debris Cleaning Laser Plus Kethane Extracting, Pumping, and Converting)

[ATTACH=CONFIG]32633[/ATTACH]

Let me just say, the Kethane mod is incredible. Also, it actually works with the new planets without any modifications.

Not even the name can make me dislike it! ;p
Mining..... ON EVE OR DUNA...... YEAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Let me just say, the Kethane mod is incredible. Also, it actually works with the new planets without any modifications.

Not even the name can make me dislike it! ;p

Glad you like it Nova, it means much to us .

And we named it Kethane for a reason
Wow, I'm very happy that Nova is enjoying our MMI packs. I am currently in the process of moving, so I will be able to get my stuff together soon and continue with the Orbiter project.

Glad to read all those things :-) I like this plugin a lot, same as I like making it. However recently I don't have much time, so unfortunately it must wait.

I've already got a lot of new code done, but there's still a lot to do. I also don't want to release something that is not tested and at least 99% sure.

So... there's quite a long road ahead, but I won't leave it as it is - there will be a good update, sooner or later
certainly the "Keithane" (using British linguistic nuances) pack is fantastic, (if only i could get these solar panels to work...)
Erm.. Anyone else not getting the "bip" sound when detects/detecting kethane? I got some other mods here, but why does this always happens??

im getting that the solar pannels ae not useable with th current version...otherwise looks great minus the fact i still cant get onto the moon sucessfully

but i look forward to future add-ons also any know how i can fix the issue with the solar pannels aying theyre not compatible or is it just a bug and i know i dont have an outdated version of th kethane pack

Regarding the Solar Panels,

I'm aware of the issue but I don't have a grip on other plugins. However there are a whole new bunch of stuff about to be released. I just need to yell at somebody to do so
Please start yelling.

Regarding the Solar Panels,

I'm aware of the issue but I don't have a grip on other plugins. However there are a whole new bunch of stuff about to be released. I just need to yell at somebody to do so

well ok, that is great.

will the new parts replace old ones or will i need to re make some of my probes??

There's an unreleased pack of new energy parts (5 or so solar panels, 2 batteries, 1 engine) which I'm responsible for.

They look really cool but need to be balanced against the other stuff, which means I first have to calculate efficiency values for the other stuff.
I just wanted to take some time to say that this is awesome. You guys are amazing for making this. I only just got into it now, but I already have my Kethane sensor in a low polar Mun orbit
amsome no more ending a mission on the mun and send another rover nice idea realy like it
Dani-Sang Do you care if I use this when Kermaggedon gets released in the Voyager labs Server, Im not changing anything, I just want to make sure its ok with you.

Im curious ... Will Kethane-density differ from planet to planet? Kethanepockets would by logic be more plentyful on rocky planets and moons than on desert- or magma-planets in example. Also - will there be a way to convert Kethane to energy, maybe?

There are differences on the existing bodies, but the new ones will all have the same count and similar sizes until the code is adjusted manually.

With the next kethane version, it will probably be possible to make a kethane generator.
well i worked out the cause of my solar panel issues. I, being an idiot, had placed Keithane pumps as solar panels...

well i worked out the cause of my solar panel issues. I, being an idiot, had placed Keithane pumps as solar panels...

Prepare to be sig'd.
